item.title: Announcing General Availability of Authenticator Lite (in Outlook)
item.description:
Last month, Authenticator Lite (in Outlook) moved to public preview, bringing the security and reliability of Microsoft Authenticator to an app users already have on their phones. Today we’re excited to announce that Authenticator Lite (in Outlook) is now generally available!
According to research done by Microsoft, multifactor authentications completed via push notifications in the Microsoft Authenticator app are 71% less likely to be compromised than those completed via SMS codes.
